Eosinophilic folliculitis 
Topical corticosteroids, 
antihistamines, 
phototherapy, and 
Itraconazole 100-
200mg/day for 3 weeks  
 
In patients with 
eosinophilic folliculitis, 
HIV should be ruled out. 
First-line treatment for 
this condition is 
antiretroviral therapy. 
For common etiological agents causing folliculitis, see Annexure B.9.6 
*In case of long-term treatment if patient is not improving, TDM (therapeutic drug monitoring) for 
itraconazole should be considered.
